info.title: @digipair/skill-web-spectrum
info.description: This skill allows users to create web interfaces using the Spectrum design system.

parameters.name: allow-multiple
parameters.description: Allows multiple accordion items to be opened at the same time

parameters.name: density
parameters.description: Sets the spacing between the content to borders of an accordion item

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: tabIndex
parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

x-events.name: sp-accordion-item-toggle
x-events.description: Announce that an accordion item has been toggled while allowing the event to be cancelled.

parameters.name: emphasized
parameters.description: Deliver the Action Bar with additional visual emphasis.

parameters.name: flexible
parameters.description: When `flexible` the action bar sizes itself to its content rather than a specific width.

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: The variant applies specific styling when set to `sticky` or `fixed`. `variant` attribute is removed when not matching one of the above.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Causes the browser to treat the linked URL as a download.

parameters.name: href
parameters.description: The URL that the hyperlink points to.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: An accessible label that describes the component. It will be applied to aria-label, but not visually rendered.

parameters.name: referrerpolicy
parameters.description: How much of the referrer to send when following the link.

parameters.name: rel
parameters.description: The relationship of the linked URL as space-separated link types.

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description: Whether an Action Button with `role='button'` should also be `aria-pressed='true'`

parameters.name: static-color
parameters.description: The static color variant to use for the action button.

parameters.name: tabIndex
parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Where to display the linked URL, as the name for a browsing context (a tab, window, or <iframe>).

parameters.name: toggles
parameters.description: Whether to automatically manage the `selected` attribute on interaction and whether `aria-pressed="false"` should be used when `selected === false`

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The default behavior of the button. Possible values are: `button` (default), `submit`, and `reset`.

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: Announces a change in the `selected` property of an action button

x-events.name: longpress
x-events.description: Synthesizes a "longpress" interaction that signifies a `pointerdown` event that is >=300ms or a keyboard event where code is `Space` or code is `ArrowDown` while `altKey===true`.

x-events.name: click
x-events.description: Announces a click event on the action button

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: Announces that selection state has been changed by user

parameters.name: force-popover
parameters.description: Forces the Picker to render as a popover on mobile instead of a tray.

parameters.name: pending
parameters.description: Whether the items are currently loading.

parameters.name: pending-label
parameters.description: Defines a string value that labels the Picker while it is in pending state.

parameters.name: selects
parameters.description: By default `sp-action-menu` does not manage a selection. If you'd like for a selection to be held by the `sp-menu` that it presents in its overlay, use `selects="single" to activate this functionality.

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: Announces that the `value` of the element has changed

x-events.name: sp-opened
x-events.description: Announces that the overlay has been opened

parameters.name: dismissible
parameters.description: Whether to include an icon-only close button to dismiss the alert banner

parameters.name: open
parameters.description: Controls the display of the alert banner

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: The variant applies specific styling when set to `negative` or `info`; `variant` attribute is removed when it's passed an invalid variant.

x-events.name: close
x-events.description: Announces the alert banner has been closed

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Causes the browser to treat the linked URL as a download.

parameters.name: href
parameters.description: The URL that the hyperlink points to.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Where to display the linked URL, as the name for a browsing context (a tab, window, or <iframe>).

parameters.name: compact
parameters.description: compact option is useful for reducing the height of the breadcrumbs

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Accessible name for the Breadcrumbs component

parameters.name: max-visible-items
parameters.description: Override the maximum number of visible items

parameters.name: menu-label
parameters.description: Change the default label of the action menu

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: Announces the selected breadcrumb item

parameters.name: no-wrap
parameters.description: Disables text wrapping within the button component's label. Please note that this option is not a part of the design specification and should be used carefully, with consideration of this overflow behavior and the readability of the button's content.

parameters.name: quiet
parameters.description: Style this button to be less obvious

parameters.description: How much of the referrer to send when following the link.

parameters.description: The relationship of the linked URL as space-separated link types.

parameters.description: The visual treatment to apply to this button.

parameters.name: open
parameters.description: Whether the popover is visible or not.

x-events.name: primary
x-events.description: Announces that the "primary" button has been clicked.

x-events.name: secondary
x-events.description: Announces that the "secondary" button has been clicked.

x-events.name: input
x-events.description: The value of the Color Area has changed.

parameters.name: autocomplete
parameters.description: What form of assistance should be provided when attempting to supply a value to the form control

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: grows
parameters.description: Whether a form control delivered with the `multiline` attribute will change size vertically to accomodate longer input

parameters.name: invalid
parameters.description: Whether the `value` held by the form control is invalid.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A string applied via `aria-label` to the form control when a user visible label is not provided.

parameters.name: maxlength
parameters.description: Defines the maximum string length that the user can enter

parameters.name: minlength
parameters.description: Defines the minimum string length that the user can enter

parameters.name: multiline
parameters.description: Whether the form control should accept a value longer than one line

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: Pattern the `value` must match to be valid

parameters.name: placeholder
parameters.description: Text that appears in the form control when it has no value set

parameters.name: quiet
parameters.description: Whether to display the form control with no visible background

parameters.name: readonly
parameters.description: Whether a user can interact with the value of the form control

parameters.name: required
parameters.description: Whether the form control will be found to be invalid when it holds no `value`

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: The specific number of rows the form control should provide in the user interface

parameters.name: tabIndex
parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

parameters.name: valid
parameters.description: Whether the `value` held by the form control is valid.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value held by the form control

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Provides an accessible name for the action button trigger.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The `offset` property accepts either a single number, to define the offset of the Popover along the main axis from the action button, or 2-tuple, to define the offset along the main axis and the cross axis.

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: The `variant` property applies specific styling on the action button trigger.

x-events.name: close
x-events.description: Announces that the dialog has been closed.

parameters.name: responsive
parameters.description: When set to true, fills screens smaller than 350px high and 400px wide with the full dialog.

x-events.name: close
x-events.description: Announces that the dialog has been closed.

parameters.name: responsive
parameters.description: When set to true, fills screens smaller than 350px high and 400px wide with the full dialog.

x-events.name: cancel
x-events.description: Announces that the "cancel" button has been clicked.

x-events.name: close
x-events.description: Announces that the dialog has been closed.

x-events.name: confirm
x-events.description: Announces that the "confirm" button has been clicked.

x-events.name: secondary
x-events.description: Announces that the "secondary" button has been clicked.

parameters.name: dragged
parameters.description: Indicates that files are currently being dragged over the dropzone.

parameters.name: dropEffect
parameters.description: Controls the feedback (typically visual) the user is given during a drag and drop operation

parameters.name: filled
parameters.description: Set this property to indicate that the component is in a filled state.

x-events.name: sp-dropzone-dragleave
x-events.description: Announces when dragged files have been moved out of the UI without having been dropped.

x-events.name: sp-dropzone-dragover
x-events.description: Announces when files have been dragged over the UI, but not yet dropped.

x-events.name: sp-dropzone-drop
x-events.description: Announces when dragged files have been dropped on the UI.

x-events.name: sp-dropzone-should-accept
x-events.description: A cancellable event that confirms whether or not a file dropped on the UI should be accepted.

parameters.name: ignore
parameters.description: whether menu should be ignored by roving tabindex controller

parameters.name: selects
parameters.description: how the menu allows selection of its items: - `undefined` (default): no selection is allowed - `"inherit"`: the selection behavior is managed from an ancestor - `"single"`: only one item can be selected at a time - `"multiple"`: multiple items can be selected

parameters.name: format-options
parameters.description: An `<sp-number-field>` element will process its numeric value with `new Intl.NumberFormat(this.resolvedLanguage, this.formatOptions).format(this.valueAsNumber)` in order to prepare it for visual delivery in the input. In order to customize this processing supply your own `Intl.NumberFormatOptions` object here. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/NumberFormat/NumberFormat

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: The distance by which to alter the value of the element when taking a "step". When this.formatOptions.style === 'percentage' the default step will be set to 0.01 unless otherwise supplied to the element.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Whether the overlay trigger is disabled

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The distance between the overlay and the trigger

parameters.name: placement
parameters.description: The placement of the overlay relative to the trigger

parameters.name: triggered-by
parameters.description: Optional property to optimize performance and prevent race conditions. By explicitly declaring which content types are used (e.g. "click", "longpress hover"), we can avoid:  Extra renders from unnecessary slot reparenting Potential infinite render loops during content detection Race conditions during slot assignment  By only returning overlay wrappers for explicitly declared content types, we minimize unecessary DOM nodes, operations and ensure a more stable rendering behavior.

x-events.name: sp-closed
x-events.description: Announces that the overlay has been closed

x-events.name: sp-opened
x-events.description: Announces that the overlay has been opened

parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Where to display the linked URL, as the name for a browsing context (a tab, window, or <iframe>).

parameters.name: default-value
parameters.description: Set the default value of the handle. Setting this property will cause the handle to reset to the default value on double click or pressing the `escape` key.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: editable
parameters.description: Whether to display a Number Field along side the slider UI

parameters.name: hide-stepper
parameters.description: Whether the stepper UI of the Number Field is hidden or not

parameters.name: indeterminate
parameters.description: Applies `indeterminate` to the underlying `sp-number-field` when `editable === true`. Is removed on the next `change` event.

parameters.name: quiet
parameters.description: Applies `quiet` to the underlying `sp-number-field` when `editable === true`.

parameters.name: tabIndex
parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: By default, the value of a Slider Handle will be halfway between its `min` and `max` values, or the `min` value when `max` is less than `min`.

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: An alteration to the value of the element has been committed by the user.

x-events.name: input
x-events.description: The value of the element has changed.

x-events.name: change

parameters.name: primary-max
parameters.description: The maximum size of the primary pane

parameters.name: primary-min
parameters.description: The minimum size of the primary pane

parameters.name: secondary-max
parameters.description: The maximum size of the secondary pane

parameters.name: secondary-min
parameters.description: The minimum size of the secondary pane

parameters.name: splitter-pos
parameters.description: The current splitter position of split-view

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: Announces the new position of the splitter

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: A status light in a disabled state shows that a status exists, but is not available in that circumstance. This can be used to maintain layout continuity and communicate that a status may become available later.

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: The visual variant to apply to this status light.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: tabIndex
parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: tabIndex
parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: Announces a change in the `checked` property of a Switch

parameters.name: density
parameters.description: Changes the spacing around table cell content.

parameters.name: emphasized
parameters.description: Deliver the Table with additional visual emphasis to selected rows.

parameters.name: itemValue
parameters.description: The value of an item. By default, it is set to the index of the sp-table-row.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: The content of the rows rendered by the virtualized table. The key is the value of the sp-table-row, and the value is the sp-table-row's content (not the row itself).

parameters.name: scroller
parameters.description: Whether or not the virtualized table has a scroll bar. If this is set to true, make sure to specify a height in the sp-table's inline styles.

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description: An array of  values that have been selected.

parameters.name: selects
parameters.description: Whether the Table allows users to select a row or rows, and thus controls whether or not the Table also renders checkboxes.

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: Announces a change in the `selected` property of a table row

x-events.name: rangeChanged
x-events.description: Announces a change in the range of visible cells on the table body

parameters.name: auto
parameters.description: Whether to activate a tab on keyboard focus or not. By default a tab is activated via a "click" interaction. This is specifically intended for when tab content cannot be displayed instantly, e.g. not all of the DOM content is available, etc. To learn more about "Deciding When to Make Selection Automatically Follow Focus", visit: https://w3c.github.io/aria-practices/#kbd_selection_follows_focus

parameters.name: compact
parameters.description: The tab items are displayed closer together.

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: quiet
parameters.description: The tab list is displayed without a border.

parameters.name: tabIndex
parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: The selected Tab child has changed.

parameters.name: autocomplete
parameters.description: What form of assistance should be provided when attempting to supply a value to the form control

parameters.name: disabled
parameters.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

parameters.name: grows
parameters.description: Whether a form control delivered with the `multiline` attribute will change size vertically to accomodate longer input

parameters.name: invalid
parameters.description: Whether the `value` held by the form control is invalid.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A string applied via `aria-label` to the form control when a user visible label is not provided.

parameters.name: maxlength
parameters.description: Defines the maximum string length that the user can enter

parameters.name: minlength
parameters.description: Defines the minimum string length that the user can enter

parameters.name: multiline
parameters.description: Whether the form control should accept a value longer than one line

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: Pattern the `value` must match to be valid

parameters.name: placeholder
parameters.description: Text that appears in the form control when it has no value set

parameters.name: quiet
parameters.description: Whether to display the form control with no visible background

parameters.name: readonly
parameters.description: Whether a user can interact with the value of the form control

parameters.name: required
parameters.description: Whether the form control will be found to be invalid when it holds no `value`

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: The specific number of rows the form control should provide in the user interface

parameters.name: tabIndex
parameters.description: The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property

parameters.name: valid
parameters.description: Whether the `value` held by the form control is valid.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value held by the form control

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: An alteration to the value of the element has been committed by the user.

x-events.name: input
x-events.description: The value of the element has changed.

parameters.name: icon-label
parameters.description: The `iconLabel` property is used to set the `label` attribute on the icon element. This is used to provide a text alternative for the icon to ensure accessibility. If the iconLabel property is not set, the icon will use the variant to dynamically set the label.

parameters.name: open
parameters.description: The `open` property indicates whether the toast is visible or hidden.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: When a timeout is provided, it represents the number of milliseconds from when the Toast was placed on the page before it will automatically dismiss itself. Accessibility concerns require that a Toast is available for at least 6000ms before being dismissed, so any timeout of less than 6000ms will be raised to that baseline. It is suggested that messages longer than 120 words should receive an additional 1000ms in their timeout for each additional 120 words in the message. For example, a message with 240 words should have a timeout of 7000ms, and a message with 360 words should have a timeout of 8000ms.

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: The variant applies specific styling when set to `negative`, `positive`, `info`, `error`, or `warning`. The variants error and warning are deprecated and should be replaced with negative. variant attribute is removed when not matching one of the above.

x-events.name: close
x-events.description: Announces that the Toast has been closed by the user or by its timeout.

parameters.name: self-managed
parameters.description: Automatically bind to the parent element of the assigned `slot` or the parent element of the `sp-tooltip`. Without this, you must provide your own `overlay-trigger`.

parameters.name: ignore-url-parts
parameters.description: A space separated list of part of the URL to ignore when matching for the "selected" Top Nav Item. Currently supported values are `hash` and `search`, which will remove the `#hash` and `?search=value` respectively.

parameters.name: quiet
parameters.description: The Top Nav is displayed without a border.

x-events.name: close
x-events.description: Announces that the Tray has been closed.

x-events.name: close
x-events.description: When the underlay is "clicked" and the consuming pattern should chose whether to close based on that interaction

x-events.name: change
x-events.description: Announces that the value of `selected` has changed

parameters.name: system
parameters.description: Name of the theme to apply

post.description: Item of the horizontal navigation bar

x-events.name: click
x-events.description: Action triggered when clicking the button
